  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82218</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82218</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Active transport of dissolved substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktiver Transport der aufgelösten Substanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transport actif des substances dissoutes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transporte ativo de substâncias dissolvidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasporto attivo delle sostanze dissolte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργός μεταφορά των διαλυμένων ουσιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transporte activo de sustancias disueltas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how dissolved substances are actively transported from the small intestines (low concentration) to the blood (high concentration).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">active transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capillaries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolved substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">small intestines</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie aufgelöste Substanzen
aktiv von den kleinen Därmen (niedrige Konzentration) zum Blut 
transportiert werden (hohe Konzentration).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment des substances 
dissoutes sont activement transportées des petits intestins (basse 
concentration) au sang (concentration élevée).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como as substâncias 
dissolvidas são transportadas ativamente dos intestines pequenos 
(concentração baixa) ao sangue (concentração elevada).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come le sostanze 
dissolte attivamente sono trasportate dai piccoli intestini 
(concentrazione bassa) all'anima (alta concentrazione).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι διαλυμένες 
ουσίες μεταφέρονται ενεργά από τα λεπτά έντερα (χαμηλή 
συγκέντρωση) στο αίμα (υψηλή συγκέντρωση).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo las sustancias 
disueltas se transportan activamente de los intestinos pequeños 
(concentración baja) a la sangre (alta concentración).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktiver Transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blut</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapillaren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konzentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aufgelöste Substanzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kleine Därme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transport actif</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
